author: siladu
content:
As we improve Besu performance of some core EVM components (which tend to have less comprehensive reference tests than newer EIPs), it's been useful to have differential fuzzing to regression test against other clients. 
Not sure if that's an additional item on the wishlist. I guess Differential LLMing could help us here as well, to tease out client-specifics optimisations (or lack of)
